# Instructor Guide {-}

C-MOOR miniCURE content overview.

### Content overview {-}

| **Name** | **Length** | **Notes** |
| :--- | :---: | :---: |
| [Overview / Scientific Process](https://www.c-moor.org/miniCURE-RNA-seq/introduction.html) | 1 hr | |
| [#1: Scientific Literature](https://www.c-moor.org/miniCURE-RNA-seq/scientific-literature.html) | Full lab | Pre-lab: Scientific Literature |
| [#2: Model Organisms](https://www.c-moor.org/miniCURE-RNA-seq/model-organisms-and-databases.html) | Full lab | Pre-lab: Model Organisms |
| [#3: RNA-seq Analysis](https://www.c-moor.org/miniCURE-RNA-seq/rna-seq-analysis.html) | Full lab | Pre-lab: Intro to RNA-seq |
| [#4: Differential Gene Expression](https://www.c-moor.org/miniCURE-RNA-seq/differential-gene-expression.html) | Full lab | |
| [#5: Kickstart Project Work](https://www.c-moor.org/miniCURE-RNA-seq/kickstart-project-work.html) | Flexible | |
| [Tutorial Center](https://www.c-moor.org/miniCURE-RNA-seq/tutorial-center.html) | Flexible? | Optional |
| [Poster presentation](https://www.cloviscollege.edu/landing/stem-research-symposium-2023.html) | Flexible | Optional |


### Sample schedules {-}
